content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my car north and saw the objectin the noth west sky it look like it landed behaing 'western state university.  maybee a large meteor the color was neon like i never saw beefore

sincerely,
john haeckel
content.summary: Blue green almost irridecent two streeks in the north west looked like a pool que there were two right behin each other

content.detailedDescription: it was a quiet cool clear night fore day in the morning at 4:55 a.M.. i was walking in the sireet heading home to my house on the north side of the city. when i looked up to my right i seen four bright white lights in the sky. i thought that was strange since there is no tall buildings or towers in that diection and that they had a triangle style shape. as i came closer i could begen to see the out line of a thick flat black colored triangle shaped craft with rounded off edges. it had four large bright white lights under it. there was one on the leading edge one on each corner and one in the back that lined up with the front light. i was walking slowly trying to make out the craft. i heard nothing until i was within a block i head a very low rumble that seem back and higher up the the craft. it was not like any civil or military aircraft or helicopter. the fact that it stood still in mid air with a no movement or the loud poping and clicking of a main rotor made it not a helicopter and it had no nav light of either green or red which on a clear night like this i could have seen at that range. it was about twenty stories off the ground and was 70 to 80 feet in span and 40 to 55 in length and about 15 to 20 tall. it had a very smooth bottom and was a perfect triangle. it silently moved low and slowly to the southwest until i could not see it any more.
content.summary: unknown flat black thick triangle

content.detailedDescription:
The date was july 6, 2000 at around the beginning of sunset. i didn't look to see the exact time. the sky was pink, orange and reddish colors that indicated the sun was in the process of setting sometime soon. there were huge puffy white clouds low in the sky as i sat in my car facing a northerly direction on route 110 at the corner of melville road intersection where i had to stop for a red light. i was first in line in the left turn lane as i intended to turn left into melville road heading west towards farmingdale. i looked at the traffic light for a second after it turned red and then my gaze suddenly went towards the right of it because i noticed what i thought was the moon. this object was directly to the right of a huge white cloud and this 'moon' was just hanging there. i kept looking at it and noticed that it was a lot larger than the moon would ordinarily be, and that it was shimmering. i remember thinking to myself, "why in the world is that moon shimmering?". i'd never seen the moon do that and the color of it was like a silvery-white and very round, almost like a smooth satiny finish to it that is more like a shimmery atmosphere, than a material. it was absolutely beautiful. 
i kept watching it while waiting for the red light to turn green and it remained stationary so i believed it was the moon. but then it started to move downwards adjacent to the cloud and i then knew it wasn't the moon i was looking at. as it moved downward it gradually turned into an elliptical shape and it struck me that i was witnessing a genuine ufo in flight. 
i was angry at myself for not having my camcorder on hand in the car and moved so that my rear-view mirror was almost in line with the ufo. i had lined up the object while it was still a round shape next to the mirror and saw that the object was a bit bigger than the size of a quarter compared with the mirror. when the ufo reached the bottom of that cloud it resumed its round shape and hovered for a few seconds, then started moving under that same cloud towards the west. the traffic light had not changed yet so i kept watching the ufo and saw it move towards the west under the cloud, which was more grayer on the bottom of it by then. the ufo kept travelling towards the west at a great speed in about 2 seconds and after it got to the other side of that same cloud, it went upwards in a vertical path while still appearing as a sphere. after the ufo arrived at the top of the cloud but still adjacent to it, it went behind the cloud and disappeared from my sightline.
i have never seen anything like that before in my entire life, or since, but in those three minutes or so of watching that object, i truly believed it was extra-terrestrial. i've never done drugs or alcohol and was not on medication and my mind was perfectly clear and i have no emotional problems. there was nothing at all that would make me doubt what i saw was an accurate witnessing of a ufo. after i watched the ufo duck behind that cloud, i thought that maybe i should have gotten out of the car and told the person in the car next to mine to look up in the sky. i didn't do that which i now regret. i might have had other witnesses to back me up also. however, i did feel that i was privileged to have seen this ufo and it may never happen to me again in my lifetime. but just for this one time, i saw somethng that many people never get a chance to, probably because they don't bother looking at the sky like i did. after the light changed to green, i had to drive on and continue home. i have since told several people, including members of my family, about my ufo sighting, but they apparently don't or won't believe. it's not surprising since they didn't have first-hand experience like i did. yes, at first i thought maybe i was hallucinating so i pinched my skin hard a few times and no, i hadn't fallen asleep and dreamt it. i later on realized that melville and some of long island is home to many aerospace related companies and that, perhaps, these ufos are observing them. they couldn't possibly have been hovering over long island just to watch the traffic patterns and other evidence of human development, could they? i also thought that if the ufo isn't extra-terrestrial, then maybe the u.S. government is testing  spacecraft that can hover above cities and then move at great speeds to another area. but then, where did the government get that kind of technology that possibly nobody else has? i have since retired and moved away from long island but i am still very much fascinated and curious about that ufo i witnessed and all others. i certainly hope that valid answers will be forthcoming soon before i grow too old to care anymore. sorry, i have no photos of the incident. just my vivid memories of it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Melville, long island, new york, i saw a moving sphere in the sky after mistaking it for the moon

content.detailedDescription: In bed.Floated out of closed window,(memory recoverd through hypnosis by bud hopkins)saw my self standing in driveway in my blue pajamas with big white buttons.At the front left corner of my house i looked over beech tree in neighbors yard saw cigar shaped craft that looked as it had been camoflauged.Next craft must have been over me,my arm over my eyes,light to bright.On craft on silver table.Short being holding up right hand,three long fingers.Felt like being at head of table more capacity but could not see it.Have more info,physical,medical.
content.summary: Floated through closed window,saw cigar shaped craft,bush lit up like arc welder,on craft on silver table, being at my feet.

content.detailedDescription: Husband and myself walking out of home improvement store facing east turned left to walk to car now facing north cloudy sky due to hurricane rita but break in black clouds moving rapidly suddenly i noticed in corner of my right eye light shining behind black cloud and when it passed break in clouds we both saw very big bright light blue ball surrounded by orange light and then it was gone we waited for a sound of an explosion but nothing ever happened everyone telling us it was a meteor but we feel it was something else and no meteor hit was ever reported in news media and this ball would have definitely caused a very big explosion as it hit the ground and left a very big hole.
content.summary: Ball of fire

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately 7:15pm, sunday september 25th. the phone rang-- it was my wife, calling from work. as i often do while on the phone, i stepped outside as we talked. there was still a good amount of light from the sun, which had set behind glassford hill (my back yard faces west, directly toward the hill). i immediately saw the orange ball and knew what it was. i have seen perhaps 10 of these in the 3.5 years i���ve lived at this house. with most of my sightings, the objects have been moving in a roughly south to north path, but a few ���including one dramatic sighting- have moved in a north-south direction. this time it was moving south to north.

this time the object was quite close, and very distinct, directly in front of me and clear. it was, again, a very bright orange glowing ball. there appeared to be something above it that the glow was reflecting on. as with another close sighting, when my wife and i both had a good amount of time to view one of these objects, i had the impression that the glow was on the underside of a larger object. this time, perhaps because there was more ambient light in the sky, the thing above the main glowing object was more apparent. i almost got the impression that what i was looking at might be a balloon with some sort of large flare burning under it. (is there any known weather balloon or anything that fits that description?) it appeared to be quite close (although it is admittedly difficult to judge distances of lights in the dark sky) and was completely silent.

i was quite excited and told my wife what was happening. when she put me on hold (oddly, to tell a customer at her work that i was watching a ufo), i started yelling out loudly that there was a ufo in the sky, hoping that one of the neighbors would look up. i���m sure i sounded like a nut, but i was hoping that some other people would see what i was seeing (i don���t know if anyone heard or looked up and saw it). 

it was moving fairly quickly, and since the air was very still, it seems unlikely that this was a balloon or anything else floating in the wind. i ran inside and grabbed my camera. the object was still quite close but i was having a hard time getting the camera to focus on it in the dim light. frustrated, i watched it for a little while longer and decided to try to take a picture again. this time it focused and i got the attached snapshot. it was quite far away by now and appeared as just a small dot in the sky. in the picture the object looks blurred because, presumably, the shudder speed was long. the combination of the movement of the object and my hand shaking is what caused the object the be shaped that way (i am assuming this because it was clearly round to my eye).

also attached is a photoshop sketch of what i saw, as the photo is so poor and doesn���t really illustrate my sighting. it���s quite a cartoon-ish attempt but i think it shows what i saw well enough.

i have another report from 12-28-2004 that i can send you, along with another photo, if you would like. let me know. i hope you can look into this sighting tonight and let me know if there is any explanation for what i saw tonight (and have seen many times here in prescott valley).
content.summary: Large glowing orb moving south to north

content.detailedDescription: Looking out the window. i saw something out of the corner of my eye and notice there were two red stars next to a brighter white one.  i thought it was a plane at first because it was flashing red, but they started moving closer to each other. one stayed close to a white star, the other moved more to the west, then south, then down.  they stayed that way, with the one on the right slowly moving farther away. they looked like they were bouncing up and down in place.  then the one on the right flickered and disappeared. about 30 seconds later, the other one left also.
content.summary: Noticed two red lights in the north west sky - moving independently of each other. we observed them for awhile and then they disappeared one at a time.

content.detailedDescription:
1. outside country home with no outdoor lights on smoking a cig.
2. i always leave the lights off so i can look at the stars and find satellites and stuff.
3. at first a bright star, or a satellite
4. i was star like, then got really bright (as if lighting its engines?..Im not sure really) then the light seemed to be getting further away untill the light/star disapeared.
5. i called my wife to see and she saw the light get bright and disappear as well
6. it seemed to get to far away
content.summary: Looked like bright star in space, then got extremely bright, then disappeared as if gettin farther away

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my daughter's cheerleading practice which had ended around 7:20pm. several of the parents and i were standing outside of the school discussing upcoming sports events while the girls played in a nearby playground. during our conversation one of the mothers stopped speaking mid-sentence, pointing upwards behind me. i turned around immediately and saw two lights, one red, the other white, clearly visible in the sky east of me. these lights appeared to be at least a mile away and at a fairly low altitude (to be an aircraft). the lights seemed to be traveling at high speed, heading from south to north and remained visible to me for at least 5 seconds before they 'vanished'. the sky was rather clear, with very few scattered clouds. the lights didn't go behind a cloud or other obstruction from my vantage point. 
   there is an airport not far away but i've lived here my whole life and i'm used to seeing aircraft approaching and leaving and these lights were not in an area nor heading, nor speed, nor altitude consistent with this. the other odd thing about the lights was that they appeared to blink, not like aircraft strobe lights which flash.
   i could see the lights clearly, enough to distinguish their color, but i could not discern an object between them, probably due to the low light at the time.I'm sure the sun had already set by this time so i doubt this was a trick of light on a cloud. i've also seen military aircraft over the years fly over this area at a similar altitude and speed but these were always clearly heard. so far as i know noone there heard any sound from the object.
   at first i thought the object to by a low flying jet, but the lack of engine noise at what appeared to be such a close distance makes me think otherwise. in all likelihood it was an aircraft;but, the speed, odd blinking of the lights and abrupt way in which the object disappeared from sight leaves me baffled.
   i continued to observe the the sky for several minutes, thinking the object may have turned, causing me to lose sight of the lights, but i saw nothing else.

   i hope i haven't wasted your time and that maybe this report might help in some way. thank you.
content.summary: One red light followed by one white light at high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
Earlier today around 2:45 am cst...I was in the driveway, heading back to the house from the roadside....As out of habit i was glancing up at the sky...Tonight was especially good since it was very clear and saw nothing but stars in the sky and temps were around 50 -55 degrees...

i then noticed a red object in the west (over my house) and the object was heading in a general northern pattern...At first i thought it was a plane but as i watched it, i noticed no other color lights and i didn't hear a sound...It remained in my sight for over 30 seconds because my attention was diverted to a "shooting star" that was very bright and also traveled in the same direction...By the time i looked back for the original object, it was gone...
content.summary: Outside in driveway of house when i noticed a red light in the western sky moving towards the north...Didn't see any other lights and no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the telephone with my girlfriend chatting while laying down in my bed looking up through my sunroof, when i noticed what appeared to be a fighter jet or some sort of aircraft until i was able to tell that the lights seemed to be jumping around and making movements that are clearly impossible to perform with the current technology that we have. i first noticed the object as i was just looking up at the sky and saw the unusual light patterns and the jerky movements that the craft seemed to be making around the sky and then it disappeared behind the treeline. i didn't feel any different in my actions and reactions during the sighting other than nervousness and curiousity as to where this object may be headed or what it is in general.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Alternating red and orange lights; pod in the sky jumping around from place to place

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was relaxing in a chair on my outside second floor deck.
2. bright object racing across the sky came into my view.
3. i thought it might be a meteor.
4. it was a silent fiery type ball that moved extremely fast and then disappeared. it did not come to the ground, or disappear behind something else, it simply faded into the still clear sky.
5. i jumped out of my chair and had to take my eye off of it for a split second (to avoid a table). when i looked up again it lasted another couple of seconds before it disappeared. 
6. it disappeared.
content.summary: I saw a very bright, silent, ball of fire type object streak across the sky and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: Approx 09:07 pm est. looking up at the eastern sky above columbus ohio. facing eastern sky i see two intensily bright white lights like stars or the planet venus just sitting there no movement. they are 1 to two inches apart from each other like twins. same intensity and brightness. i begin to notice that they start to move exactly the same speed and direction to each other. they move for about ten seconds and while moving at about ten seconds the brightness of light dims to blend in with the hue of the sky at night. like someone turning the reo-stat from full gain to zero gain. a gradual fading to nothing.
content.summary: Two stationary bright white stars start to move due east in syncronicity

content.detailedDescription: I come from a very large family, at that time there were at least 8 of us sleeping upstairs, girls sharing 2 bedrooms and 2 brothers in one bedroom, mom and dad downstairs.I was a teen at the time, 13, maybe 14yrs. old. i'm not real sure on the year it happened, i'm guessing around 1967-68. all i remember is me and one of my sisters who is 2 years older then me looking out our window from our bedroom and staring at this saucer shaped ufo hovering over the trees in our front yard.Don't really remember why we woke up and no-one else did, everyone else was asleep. i remember being so amazed at the beautiful lights rotating around the bottom rim of the saucer. they were moving in a clockwise rotation red, and then turn green in a counterclockwise, and then yellow. i remember there were little windows, i'm thinking maybe three, from my view, that i kept trying to see in, just kind of a warm yellow glow, i'm trying so hard to see something inside. remember,we are looking out from the upstairs window, and its less then 30 to 40 yards away, almost eye level its so low. no sound at all that i can recall, i can't keep my eyes off of it. it moved a little out of our view so that we had to run to another bedroom to watch it, waking up a younger sibling who got so scared when she asked us what we were doing, and we replied, watching a flying saucer, she got up to look out and it shot in the air so fast by the time she got to the window she could barely see it. what puzzles us to this day almost 40 years later is why we didn't scream the house down, or run downstairs to wake up our parents. we just simply went back to bed and went right to sleep. we didn't talk about it to each other for years. i think this bothers me the most, you would think we would have stayed up all night talking about what we had seen. we casually mentioned it to our mother when we were adults, and she said she had seen lights out by the barnlot several times before they moved in 1969 when my brother had been killed in vietnam. through the years i have seen other unexplained things in the sky, but nothing compared to that night. i will never forget it!!
content.summary: Woke up and looked out the window and it was above the evergreen trees in our yard.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching out my back window and noticed a light around twilight that looked very bright. this light was brighter than stars and did not twinkle.  i saw the same thing yesterday, so i was looking to see if it would happen again tonight, and it did.
content.summary: I saw a bright luminous light

content.detailedDescription: I was out side walking and i looked up in the sky and i happen to see something really brite and it wasnt moving it wasnt a plane or a star and then a few hours later it was gone and i never seen something like that befor in the sky. when i seen it i didn't know what it was.Describing it as being brite no move ments and a few hours later it was gone.
content.summary: Seen a brite white something in the sky and it wasnt moving.

content.detailedDescription: I had walked outside of my girlfriends house to smoke a cig, which i do at least once a night, i was looking around in the sky,it was very clear,and not to bright out, when i noticed 4 stars forming a diamond in the heavens, i thought it was odd that the stars were spaced evenly,and that they all were the same brightness and size,no big deal, i turned to look towards the south,still looking in the sky,few planes blinking by pretty far out from me, i turned back to the north east in no less the ten seconds, and i was stunned, my diamond shape made of stars had two bright lights ,in the very middle of it, i thought,where in the hell did they come from, i knew they werent there when i was admiring the diamond seconds earlier, i questions my sanity haha,but i knew there was no way i would of missed these bright white lights, then the hair on my neck stood up,they started moving from the center of the diamond,to the left very slow then quickly moved away or up from me,all the time the lights got brighter, the two lights didnt look to be connected,but moved at the exact same time and distance, then with a bright flash or (ten times the brightness the light had been,made me see dots, the two lights seemed to speed off so fast(in the blink of an eye would be a slow comparason) i only saw two streaks,and these were short streaks. i do believe i have seen something from not this world,i dont think we are safe-meaning mankind.  ty james wewerka
content.summary: I am positive i have witnessed  something that most people would kill to see, i call it being in the right  place at the right time,scared the hell out of me! no joke

content.detailedDescription: I was in the front yard, in a lawn chair, it was just after hurricane dennis had hit the region.  we were just talking and i alway star watch and that is when i noticed three stars in the shape of a triangle perfectly spaced. i thought they were cool and then realized they were moving in a western direction and told my friends to look and spotted them out for them and  they were drinking so they couldnt focus but i hadnt been and watched them move to the west for about anohter minute or so then turned to speak to my friend and couldnt see them again. i first thought it to be stars. western move in almost a perfect line as they traveled. i have had ufo sightings after every hurricane we have had here in the panhandle and even after katrina.
content.summary: Three triangular lights fly over looked smaller than the stars

content.detailedDescription:
I went out my back sliding door at 7.00  and looked in the sky, there was a very bright light which was very interesting. it was a light which was about the size of a dime. the bright object appeared in front of a tree on a patio. the object was visible from my patio at the ten o'clock hour.There was blinking red lights, as one finds on a plane. it was very plane for a period of two hours or so and never moved. it was also interesting as the darkness came in it disappeared, and there was nothing there, and it was gone.
i mentioned it to a friend, and they said they had seen it as well around the same time. i asked them to report it as well.
content.summary: There was a bright light that was there during the twilight hours as i looked out my apartment window.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my front yard and i saw 5 circle ufos on the inside of the bottom they had red, yellow, and orange lights and emitted purple beams. then they changed into triangler ufos with one triangler ufo red lighted with pink dots at every corner the other triangler ufo yellow lighted with pink dots at every cornet and the other ufo orange lighted with pink dots at every corner they emitted red beams then purple beams. this was at 8:45 p.M on june 7, 2005 on a tuesday night. we were getting ready to go out to a late dinner at an italian restaurant and go roller skating for a while. be we watched these objects for a while and then they disappeard and we didn't see them at our house no more we were out in the front yard. but when we went out to dinner we saw a circle ufos with red, yellow, and orange lights on the inside of the bottom then 3 triangler ufos one all red lighted the other all yellow lighted and the other all orange lighted with pink dots at every corner. and they made a whistling sound they disappeard as quick as they came they left a haze and a trial in the sky. it was weird and exciting and a little scary to see these ufo. me and my friend that was with me couldn't believe these ufos we saw. it was a clear night outside and there was sound to these objects.
content.summary: Red, yellow, and orange lights over bangor maine.

content.detailedDescription: I was out driving around one night it was 8:35 p.M. on june 1, 2005 on a wednesday night we went to a mexican restaurant to eat dinner me and a friend. but when we drove by the crossroads shopping center on sam rittenburg boulevard and ashley river road we saw a ufo it was a circle ufo it had red, yellow, and orange lights on the bottom and emitted a blue beam then emitted green and purple beams then it changed into a cone ufo the top of the cone was red and the bottom of the cone was yellow. then it changed into a triangler ufo then was all green lighted then 2 more triangler ufos showed up then all 3 triangler ufos were all red lighted then all purple lighted then 2 triangler ufos were red lighted then the other one yellow lighted. then all 3 triangler ufos were all orange lighted and one emitted red beams then all 3 ufos were still all ornage lighted then they disappeared going over the crossroads shopping center and we didn't see them no more. it was exciting for us to see these ufos it was partly cloudy outside and a warm night we pulled in the shopping center got out of our car and observed these ufos we didn't hear no sound to these objects. then we went to a convenient store and got some gas at the gas station and got some snacks and cokes and kit kat bars. then we went ice skating at an ice skating rink and then i went to my friends house to hang out and have some beers and i spent the night there it was really a fun night and pretty neat to see these ufos me and my friend will always remember seeing the ufos we saw and going out to dinner and just hanging out.
content.summary: While i was out with a friend driving around on the town we went out to dinner and saw some ufos we couldn't believe it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a smoke break and noticed some weird lights floating near the crescent moon.  i watched them (4 of them) move east towards the sun.  by the time they were near the sun, there were about 40 lights or so.  they were circling, darting, and jogging, but most stayed on an easterly course.  after about 20 minutes they were all gone from my view.

12:00 - 12:20pm est
content.summary: Tiny bright lights in the sky moving west to east

content.detailedDescription: A bright large light sitting in one part of the sky then very slowly dropping down, eventually out of sight.
content.summary: A bright white light larger than a star

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i took my kids and thier cousins up to my sisters house for a visit.We were heading towards hwy 115/35 south,heading home.I was passenger in the front seat watching the planes up high in the cold,blue sky.I saw 4 planes in formation heading south towards lake ontario.
*(1)
  *(2)
    *(3)
      *(4)  (like this)
i said they must be military,when all on a sudden there was a light not as big as the planes but just as bright behind the first plane right next to its contrail and right beside the second.It didn't seem to move,it just hung there while the other 3 planes flew past and then vanished.
content.summary: Bright light hovering beside second of four contrails

content.detailedDescription: On tuesday june 7, 2005 at 10:35 p.M. at night i was at a nearby neighbors house with some friends. we were out in the backyard grilling barbecue ribs, barbecue chicken, and steaks on the outdoor grills in the backyard i looked up and saw 3 circle ufos. the first ufo was round and on the inside of the bottom it had red, yellow, and green lights then red, yellow, and purple lights the all red lights then all blue lights then again red, yellow, and purple lights then again red, yellow, and green lights and it emitted orange beams. the second ufo was round and on the inside of the bottom it had red and orange lights mainly red lights then it was a roquefort blue (what i mean by a roquefort blue it looked like roquefort and blue cheese salad dressing it had light blue lights the lights on the inside of the bottom looked like roquefort salad dressing it had light blue lights) it still had on the inside of the bottom roquefort blue lights then again red and orange lights mainly red lights and it emitted pink beams. the third ufo was round and on the inside of the bottom it had red, yellow and blue lights. then came another larger ufo and on the inside of the bottom it had red, yellow and orange lights and it disappeard as fast as it came. then all 3 circle ufos on the inside of the bottom had all red lights then all pink lights then all 3 circle ufos on the inside of the bottom had all roquefort blue lights and emitted red beams then all 3 circle ufos had all red lights again then all green lights. then 3 triangler ufos showed up they were all red lighted with purple dots at every corner than yellow dots at every corner then all 3 triangler ufos were all orange lighted with yellow dots at every corner. we were still grilling our food on the outdoor grills in the backyard then all 3 circle ufos on the inside of the bottom all red lights then all yellow lights then all green lights then all purple lights then all blue lights then all orange lights then all roquefort blue lights then all pink lights. so all 3 circle ufos on the inside of the bottom had all red, yellow, green, purple, blue, orange, roquefort blue, and all pink lights. then all 3 circle ufos on the inside of the bottom had all roquefort blue lights and emitted red beams then again all yellow lights then again all orange lights. well we also had some chefboyardee homemade pizzas in the oven. we were still grilling barbecue ribs, barbecue chicken, and steaks on the outdoor grills in the backyard and all 3 circle ufos on the inside of the bottom had red, yellow, and pink lights and the 3 triangler ufos had all roquefort blue lights with red dots and every corner and they hovered over the treetops in the backyard we watched these ufos as we were still grilling our food on the outdoor grills in the backyard. and we had cokes and dr. peppers to drink as we were grilling our food on the outdoor grills in the backyard. then all 3 circle ufos changed color one ufo on the inside of the bottom had all red lights and the other circle ufo on the inside of the bottom had all yellow lights and the other ufo on the inside of the bottom had all orange lights. and the 3 triangler ufos changed color and were all green lighted with orange dots at every corner. we got our chef boyardee homemade pizzas out of the oven and we were almost done grilling our food on the outdoor grills in the backyard. and all 3 circle ufos and all 3 triangler ufos changed to a white color and they all disappeared. we were all done grilling our food on the outdoor grills in the backyard. when all 6 of these ufos disappeard the 3 circle ufos on the inside of the bottom had all white lights and the triangler ufos had all white lights with black dots at every corner. we watched these ufos disappear and we didn't see them no more. they were going towards the ocean (to folley beach) when they disppeard i guess they crashed out in the ocean. all 6 of these ufos the three circle ufos and the triangler ufos i guess crashed out in the ocean. we went inside to eat out food we grilled on the grill and the pizzas we had in the oven. we went back out in the backyard and didn't see these ufos no more. then we saw a big cone ufo it was red on top and yellow on the bottom. then it was yellow and orange yellow on top and orange on the bottom. then it was red on top and purple on bottom. then it disappeard as fast as it came. it was going towards to ocean i guess it crashed out in the ocean. so thats 7 ufos we saw 3 circle ufos and 3 triangler ufos and a cone ufo. we went in the backyard and we didn't see none of these ufos no more. there was no sound to these ufos. it was a very clear night outside. it was really fun to be with my neighbor friends and have dinner and it was really exciting to see these ufos. i have never seen ufos like this before and my neighbor friends have never seen ufos like this before.
content.summary: While i was at a neighbors house with some friends just hanging out and shooting the bull we saw 7 ufos it was really an exciting experience

content.detailedDescription: In late summer of 1966 i was in the backyard with my family about 830 or nine o'clock in the evening when i noticed a bright object low in the sky, which i thought was a star . i had a 4 inch reflective telescope and told one of the kids to run in the house and get it for me.  i sent it up on its tripod and proceeded to watch the star.  i couldn't keep it insite when i realized it was moving.  i finally moved the telescope in accordance with its movements and soon discovered that i was not looking at one light, but three.  these were not lights like a headlight, but more like interior lighting . i kept watching it, keeping my telescope aimed at it and this went on for probably 20 minutes, since this was late in the evening it was getting dark and although i could not see the outline of the object, the lights were visible all the time.  there were no other lights, no running lights, no strobes, just these three illuminations.  since i am a private pilot and spent three years in the air force i knew something about flying and do have  running lights , and this thing had none . the time it got up to me i estimate it was maybe 300 to 400 feet above the ground and when about a quarter of a mile from my location it made a left turn which took it straight west. when i first saw it it was in the southeastern sky and came straight towards me for 20 minutes or so.  when it made a left turn i could no longer see anything.  the rules of flying keep you at least 1000 feet above the city or high enough to glide to a safe distance in case of engine failure.  i doubt this thing was anymore than 400 feet above the ground.  i had an insurance agency and had been talking with some of my agents about unidentified flying objects.  on monday morning when we were all together one of my agents told me, i would not believe what he saw.  he had been making an insurance call and decided he needed to relieve himself before he made the call.  he pulled down a side road, shut off his car, and was outside when he noted the three lights coming straight at him and going over his head at about 400 feet above the ground.  he described to me exactly what i had seen with my telescope.  i was in fort wayne, indiana and he was about 20 miles away from me close to decatur indiana.  we saw the same thing but it went right over his head.  i did not know then nor do i know now what i saw.  it was certainly an unidentified flying object.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw object in sky in summer of 1966. looked at it through telescope. it had interior lighting but no running lights. object was 1/4 mile away and got to as low as 400 ft above the gound.

content.detailedDescription: In may 1977 two memphis city police officers on duty were southbound on 1-240 midtown near the 1-240 / i-55 split at norris road intersection. (lamar todd, tact squad captain, driving, who submitted this report, was with partner jerry jeter, tact officer.) jerry jeter made the comment "i saw something in the air." they got off the interstate, turned around to head northbound and got off on the norris road exit near prospect park golf course. they stopped, and saw a triangular shape with bright lights hovering 250-300 feet above power lines. to get a better view, jeter got out, pointed the sighting scope of his rifle; the object moved away slightly, to 1000 feet. they watched for a few seconds and the object then moved quickly away over the horizon, disappearing instantaneously. lamar todd (who was also at that time a retired marine vietnam veteran) estimated 25 to 30 miles visibility that night. they called in on the radio but were told faa reported no air traffic was present. they later found out three off-duty police officers in the north precinct also saw the object near plough inc. (jackson ave. & warford rd, about 10-12 miles distant from their location.
content.summary: Five police officers on duty saw triangular shape with bright lights

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from school in my moms car looking out the window. when we were getting close to the bridge a glare hit my glasses but the sun was behined us. when i looked at were the glare was coming from i saw a silver disc shaped object reflecting the sun i thought it was a helecopter until i saw it was disc shaped. then i thought what it could beand couldn't recognize any military aircraft like it.All it did until i lost sight of it was hover in a spining in a circle like a tornado.I lost sight of the object just vanished or speed off at incredible spped causse i was staring at it.
content.summary: Silver disc shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving home from shopping. i turned down tilden road, which is the road we live on. it was dark outside and around 9:15 pm. the intersection i turned from was route 700.

2. tilden rd is a very dark country road. i immediately saw a bright red light over the north side of the road. because the road is so dark, the light stood out right away. it was a small globe of a red light that blinked on and off. although i looked very hard, there were no other colored lights associated with the globe. that seemed odd to me because airplanes and helicopters always have white or green lights too.  

3. at first i thought it was mars but then i realized it was too bright to be mars and was in the wrong spot in the sky. then i saw that it was moving, slowly, from north to south, and i knew it could not be a planet. it was a small globe of a bright red light. of course i thought it could be an airplane or a helicopter, but then it started to zig-zag up and down slowly in a meandering line, which no aircraft would do. it made no sound and seemed to be about 10-15 treetop levels up in the sky. again, it did not have any white or green lights associated with it; it was just red. it blinked slowly.

4. it moved slowly from north to south. i turned a bend in the road and lost the object behind some trees. i drove a short way down the road to my house, and got out of the car. i could not see the light in the sky above the house. i went inside and told my husband al about the light. he wanted to see it, but i wanted to i stay home (i'm 9-1/2 month's pregnant and did not feel like leaving the house again). 

he got into the car and drive down tilden rd toward allyn rd to look for the light. he was driving west. he caught sight of the red globe on the north side of tilden rd a short way away from our house, above a clearing. he said when he saw the red light it did not blink on and off at all and stayed steady. it was halfway between the middle of the sky and the horizon. it did not appear to be moving. as soon as he pulled the car over and got a good look, it suddenly disappeared, as if it knew he was looking at it. it was not near any trees or clouds, it just disappeared. 

**what is noteworthy is that when i saw the light, it was traceling from north to south, but when my husband al saw the light, it was in the far north region of the sky!**

5. we were both very spooked by the light but also intrigued. i have completed college-level astronomy coursework and have engaged in skywatching, and i feel the object was out of the ordinary. my husband and i were both scared by the light.

6. my husband drove home and told me what he saw. after some debating, i decided to take another look and we both got into the car and drove down the road to clearing. we did not see the red light again, but as we turned around to drive east to go home, we both clearly saw a bright white light flash up in the sky directly ahead of and above us. tilden rd is extremely rural and there are no light sources on or near the road.
content.summary: My husband and i saw a red light in the sky that zig-zagged and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
A teenage friend(age 18) and myself(age17) were lying in the grass on our backs in a school  playground at about 11 pm at night.  after a short conversation about the days events, my friend mike pointed to a cloudless sky and  told me that he learned about  the location and names of constellations in science class and began pointing out  the little dipper and the names of certain other star formations for me.   as our eyes were scanning the horizion,  my friend happened to notice 3 colored lights that appeared to be close by.  it was dark of course,  but i would estimate the lights to be about two miles away and about one mile high above the ground.  we were with-in 5 miles of an airport,  so the occasional appearence of multi-colored lights of small aircraft in the sky  was not unusual,  and  we both agreed that this is probably what the lights were and continued to scan the skys looking for other interesting constellations.

about 15 minutes later,  my friend looked to the horizon again and brought to my attention that the multi-colored lights were still in the same place as they were before.  we naturally thought that this was very odd,  but decided that it was either another airplane traveling the same flight path or the same plane had circled and just happened to be in the same location that we were looking.  we quickly went back to obsevering the stars. 

some time later,  about 20 minutes,  i happened to look in the direction of what we both dismissed as a airplane sighting,  and again,  in the very same place and of the exact orintation, i saw the same multi-colored lights.  i quickly brought it to the attention of my friend and together we tried to come up with a rational explanation as to why and how  an object could suspend itself in the air in the same exact place.  i finally  came to the conclusion that it must be a heliocopter,  but my friend reminded me that heliocopters are extemely noisey and it was a very quiet night with no breezes. if  the object was a heliocopter, we would definitely hear the sound of the motor and rotor blades.

we both became very puzzled,  and our attention was now focused directly on the object for about 10 minutes.  as we stared at the lights, i strained to make out some kind of outline or silhouette of the object,  but i could not see any definite shape because the object seemed to absorb what little light was available and blend into the night sky.  just as we were discussing what this thing could be,  it  suddenly moved at tremendous speed to our left at a 45 degree angle upward, about 5 miles in the sky, paused for a brief second, and then shot straight upwards  to the very outer  stratosphere of the earth,... then stoopped,  hovered,  appearing as a point of light for a second,  and then suddenly  propelling itself into deep space at an even faster speed that i had ever seen any man-made aircraft accelerate to.
the acceleration was so abrupt, that it is hard to believe that anything alive inside the craft could survive the g-forces involved.



my friend and i looked at eachother in astonishment,... all we could say to eachother is "woa",... "what was that?".  the next day we told all are friends.  some of are friends believed us,  but most did not.  however,  those that did not believe us, could not come up with an explanation either.  i am in my 50's now,  but i will never forget the experience,  and the memory of it is still fresh in my mind like it happened yesterday.  at the age of 17 years old, i was a ("i don't believe it, unless i see it") kind of a young man,  and i cerntainly did not  believe in extraterrestial spacecraft,  but after this 1969 sighting, i soon changed my opinion..
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A unidentified craft with multi-colored lights that hovered silently and could move at incredible speeds,
